name: Salandit

evolution.description: A female Salandit can evolve into Salazzle at level 9 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Toxic Lizard Pokémon. The males will do whatever the females tell them. They give the females most of their food. Due to malnutrition, the males can’t evolve.

abilities.name: Corrosion
abilities.description: This Pokémon's moves ignore the poison immunity of creatures granted by their Pokémon type, and can inflict the poisoned status on poison and steel type creatures. If the target’s secondary type gives it vulnerability or resistance to the damage, it follows the secondary type for that effect.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.
